item.title: KKR 高管认为信贷违约率上升并不令人担忧
item.description: 周五，KKR 高管对投资回报和交易表示乐观，并试图消除人们对私募股权基金募资、交易量和信贷违约放缓的担忧，称没有理由感到恐慌。【原文：KKR executives signaled optimism for investment returns and dealmaking on Friday and sought to allay concerns about slower private equity fundraising, deal volume and credit defaults saying there was no reason for alarm.】

item.title: 迪士尼与 YouTube TV 仍在商谈恢复 ABC 和 ESPN 的事宜
item.description: 迪斯尼公司周五表示，该公司正在继续与谷歌的 YouTube TV 进行谈判，以便在这家娱乐巨头旗下的电视网退出付费电视服务后，重新引入 ABC 和 ESPN。【原文：Disney said on Friday that it is continuing negotiations with Google's YouTube TV to bring back ABC and ESPN after the entertainment giant's networks went dark on the pay-TV service.】

item.title: 随着人工智能数据中心的扩张，Meta 计划在美国投入 6000 亿美元
item.description: Meta Platforms 周五表示，未来三年将向美国的基础设施和就业岗位投资 6000 亿美元，其中包括人工智能数据中心。【原文：Meta Platforms on Friday said it will invest $600 billion in U.S. infrastructure and jobs over the next three years, including artificial intelligence data centers, as the social media giant races to build infrastructure to power its AI ambitions.】

item.title: 精神航空公司在破产程序中达成节约成本的临时劳资协议
item.description: 精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）周五表示，该公司已与代表其飞行员和空乘人员的工会达成初步协议，将在合同中做出一些让步，作为其正在进行的破产保护重组进程的一部分，该公司正努力控制成本。【原文：Spirit Airlines said on Friday it has reached tentative deals with unions representing its pilots and flight attendants that would involve some contract concessions, as the carrier tries to rein in costs as part of its ongoing Chapter 11 restructuring process.】

item.title: 因空中交通管制员人手不足，美国 8 个机场航班延误
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局周五表示，将推迟亚特兰大、旧金山、休斯顿、华盛顿和纽瓦克等八个机场的航班，理由是政府停摆期间管制员未领到工资，导致空中交通人员配备问题普遍存在。【原文：The U.S. Federal Aviation Administration said on Friday it was delaying flights at eight airports including in Atlanta, San Francisco, Houston, Washington and Newark, citing widespread air traffic staffing issues as controllers have not been paid during the government shutdown.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司首席财务官称投资速度快于预期
item.description: 巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）首席财务官周五表示，由于公司投资的推出速度快于预期，预计年度资本支出将介于当前预期的中间值和最高值之间。【原文：Brazil's Petrobras expects annual capital expenditures to be between the midpoint and top of its current estimates, as it rolls out investments faster than expected, the state-run oil company's chief financial officer said on Friday.】

item.title: 文件显示，欧盟考虑放宽人工智能规则，大科技公司可能赢得缓刑
item.description: 苹果、Meta Platforms 和其他科技巨头可能会从欧盟具有里程碑意义的人工智能规则中获得缓刑，因为监管机构正在考虑放宽该法规的部分条款，作为简化过去两年中通过的一系列法规的一部分。【原文：Apple , Meta Platforms and other tech giants may win a reprieve from the EU's landmark artificial intelligence rules as regulators consider easing sections of the legislation as part of a drive to simplify a slew of regulations adopted in the last two years.】

item.title: 麦当劳和辣椒餐厅以价值取胜，快餐连锁店失去年轻食客
item.description: 随着美国消费者收紧钱包，麦当劳、Chili's 和 Domino's 等经济实惠的连锁餐厅成为赢家，吸引了更多的食客选择更便宜的餐饮。【原文：As U.S. consumers tighten their wallets, budget-friendly restaurant chains such as McDonald's, Chili's and Domino's are emerging as winners, drawing more diners who are trading down to cheaper meals.】

item.title: 伯克希尔公司警告冒充巴菲特的人工智能深度假冒者
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）要告诉那些生成或观看人工智能模仿他的人一句话。奥马哈的甲骨文只有一个。【原文：Warren Buffett has a message for people who generate or view AI-created impersonations of him. There's only one Oracle of Omaha.】

item.title: 特朗普敲定美国海湾石油租约出售事宜，提议 2026 年出售阿拉斯加石油租约
item.description: 特朗普政府周五表示，将于下月在美国海湾举行石油和天然气钻探拍卖会，并提议在阿拉斯加南部的水道举行另一次拍卖会。【原文：The Trump administration will hold an auction for drilling oil and gas off the U.S. Gulf next month and has proposed another in a waterway in southern Alaska, it said on Friday.】

item.title: 纽约联储调查发现，对通胀的担忧减少，对就业的担忧增加
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周五发布的一份报告称，上个月美国人表示，他们预计近期通胀压力将有所缓和，因为他们继续对就业市场和个人财务状况的前景感到担忧。【原文：Americans last month said that they expected moderating near-term inflation pressures as they continued to worry about the outlook for the job market and their personal finances, a report from the Federal Reserve Bank of New York said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国股票基金流入量激增，创五周新高
item.description: 截至 11 月 5 日的一周内，美国股票基金资金流入强劲，原因是投资者对与企业人工智能相关的交易保持乐观，并在市场调整期间提高了购买量。【原文：U.S. equity funds saw robust inflows in the week through November 5 as investors remained optimistic about corporate artificial intelligence-linked deals and raised purchases during a market correction.】

item.title: 丹麦将禁止 15 岁以下儿童使用社交媒体平台
item.description: 丹麦政府周五表示，丹麦将禁止 15 岁以下儿童使用社交媒体，但允许父母允许 13 岁以下的青少年访问某些平台。【原文：Denmark will ban the use of social media for children under the age of 15, the Danish government said on Friday, although parents will be allowed to give dispensation for youngsters down to the age of 13 to access certain platforms.】

item.title: 美国法官驳回 Capital One 与储户达成的 4.25 亿美元和解协议
item.description: 一名联邦法官驳回了 Capital One 与声称被骗走高利率的储户达成的 4.25 亿美元和解协议，称赔付金额太小，数百万账户持有人将继续遭受损失。【原文：A federal judge rejected Capital One's $425 million settlement with depositors who said they were cheated out of high interest rates, saying the payout was too small and millions of account holders would continue to be short-changed.】

item.title: Shein性玩偶丑闻暴露了市场的阴暗角落
item.description: 法国对 Shein 儿童性玩偶和违禁武器的打击暴露了网络市场长期存在的一个问题：未能妥善监管第三方卖家，阻止销售假冒、非法、危险或令人反感的产品。【原文：France's crackdown on Shein over childlike sex dolls and banned weapons is exposing a perennial problem of online marketplaces: failing to properly police third-party sellers and block sales of counterfeit, illegal, dangerous or simply offensive products.】

item.title: 美国环保局将于周五就 16 项小型炼油厂生物燃料豁免做出决定
item.description: 美国环境保护局表示，将于周五就小型炼油厂提出的 16 项豁免国家生物燃料掺混规定的申请作出决定。【原文：The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency said it will issue on Friday decisions on 16 petitions by small refineries for exemptions to the nation's biofuel blending mandates.】

item.title: 特朗普传媒成本飙升，季度亏损扩大
item.description: 特朗普媒体与科技集团周五公布的第三季度财报显示，受支出激增的挤压，该集团第三季度亏损扩大，收入下降，凸显了 Truth Social 母公司面临的巨大财务障碍。【原文：Trump Media & Technology Group reported a bigger third-quarter loss and a decline in revenue on Friday, squeezed by a surge in expenses, highlighting the Truth Social parent's steep financial hurdles.】

item.title: 意大利 Nexi 公司称收到 TPG 对数字银行资产的收购要约
item.description: 意大利支付集团 Nexi 周五表示，已收到美国私募股权基金 TPG 对其数字银行解决方案业务中几项资产的收购要约。【原文：Italy's Nexi has received an offer from U.S. private equity fund TPG for several assets in its digital banking solutions business, the payments group said on Friday.】

item.title: 受政府关门拖累，美国 11 月消费者情绪疲软
item.description: 周五的一项调查显示，由于担心史上最长的政府停摆会对经济造成影响，11月初美国消费者情绪降至近3年半以来的最低水平。【原文：U.S. consumer sentiment weakened to the lowest level in nearly 3-1/2 years in early November amid worries about the economic fallout from the longest government shutdown in history, a survey showed on Friday.】

item.title: 独家报道美国陆军将购买 100 万架无人机，大幅增加采购量
item.description: 美国陆军部长丹尼尔-德里斯科尔（Daniel Driscoll）表示，美国陆军的目标是在未来两到三年内购买至少一百万架无人机，并在随后的几年内每年购买五十万到数百万架无人机。【原文：The U.S. Army aims to buy at least a million drones in the next two to three years and could acquire anywhere from a half million drones to millions of them annually in the years that follow, U.S. Army Secretary Daniel Driscoll said.】

item.title: 首席执行官：人工智能平台对 Amadeus 而言不是危险，而是机遇
item.description: 西班牙旅游技术公司阿玛迪斯（Amadeus）首席执行官周五表示，该公司已 "做好充分准备"，以应对大型语言模型和人工智能平台（如 ChatGPT）可能向其行业的扩张。【原文：Spanish travel technology company Amadeus is "extremely well positioned" to deal with possible expansion into its industry by large-language-models and AI platforms like ChatGPT, the company's chief executive said on Friday.】

item.title: 亚马逊将低成本电子商务服务推向全球
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）周五将其低成本电子商务服务的覆盖范围扩大到另外 14 个市场，并将其命名为亚马逊集市（Amazon Bazaar），作为与中国竞争对手（包括申银万国和 PDD Holding 旗下的特卖公司）竞争的举措之一。【原文：Amazon.com on Friday expanded the reach of its low-cost ecommerce service to 14 additional markets and will call it Amazon Bazaar, as part of a push to compete with Chinese rivals including Shein and PDD Holding's Temu.】

item.title: 美国敦促欧洲坚持使用石油和天然气，而非可再生能源
item.description: 本周，美国能源部长和内政部长在努力说服欧洲购买更多美国石油和天然气时表示，全球对可再生能源的投资没有取得成果，世界应该把重点放在确保化石燃料的可靠供应上。【原文：Global investments in renewable energy aren't bearing fruit and the world should focus on securing reliable supplies of fossil fuels, U.S. energy and interior secretaries said this week as they worked on convincing Europe to buy more U.S. oil and gas.】

item.title: 全球股票基金流入量跃升至五周新高
item.description: 截至 11 月 5 日的一周内，全球股票基金的资金流入激增，原因是投资者对与人工智能相关的企业交易不断增加持乐观态度，在市场调整期间倾向于增加配置。【原文：Global equity funds saw a surge in inflows in the week through November 5 as investors, optimistic about rising artificial intelligence-linked corporate deals, favored higher allocations during a market correction.】

item.title: 德国央行行长在讲话中使用人工智能检查鸽鹰平衡
item.description: 德国联邦银行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）周五表示，为了探索人工智能的潜在用途，他现在正利用这项技术来检查人们对他的讲话有何看法，以及他是否在鸽派与鹰派之间找到了正确的平衡。【原文：Exploring the potential uses of artificial intelligence, Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel is now using the technology to check how his speeches will be perceived and whether he found the right balance on the dovish-hawkish spectrum, he said on Friday.】

item.title: 迪拜水烟制造商 AIR 将通过 17.5 亿美元的 SPAC 交易在美国上市
item.description: 迪拜水烟品牌 Al Fakher 的所有者 AIR 公司周五表示，已同意通过与空白支票公司 Cantor Equity Partners III 合并的方式在美国上市，合并后公司的估值为 17.5 亿美元。【原文：Dubai's AIR, the owner of hookah brand Al Fakher, said on Friday it had agreed to go public in the U.S. through a merger with blank-check firm Cantor Equity Partners III , in a deal valuing the combined company at $1.75 billion.】

item.title: 对冲基金在 10 月份的表现
item.description: 根据高盛（Goldman Sachs）的一份报告和熟悉各基金的消息来源，截至 10 月底，包括股票交易员在内的对冲基金在 2025 年的回报率超过了 13%，仅次于许多最大的多策略对冲基金。【原文：Hedge funds including stock traders have returned more than 13% in 2025 to the end of October, just ahead of many of the biggest multi-strategy hedge funds, according to a Goldman Sachs report and sources familiar with each of the funds.】

item.title: 意大利国际信托银行（Intesa）在比利时和卢森堡拓展数字投资业务
item.description: 意大利最大的银行意大利联合圣保罗银行（Intesa Sanpaolo）周五表示，其 Fideuram 私人银行部门将与贝莱德（BlackRock）合作，在比利时和卢森堡推出数字投资产品。【原文：Italy's biggest bank Intesa Sanpaolo said on Friday its Fideuram private banking arm was launching a digital investment offer partnering with BlackRock in Belgium and Luxembourg.】

item.title: 白宫顾问称美国政府关门的影响远比预期严重
item.description: 白宫经济顾问凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）周五表示，美国政府关门对经济的影响远比预期严重，但一旦关门结束，美国经济很可能迅速反弹。【原文：The economic impact of the U.S. government shutdown is far worse than expected, but the U.S. economy is likely to rebound quickly once it ends, White House economic adviser Kevin Hassett said on Friday.】

item.title: PNC 扩大分行扩张计划，到 2030 年达到 300 多家分行
item.description: 美国贷款公司 PNC 周五表示，它将在 2030 年前新开设 300 多家分行，比之前的计划增加约 100 家分行，以扩大其个人银行业务的覆盖范围。【原文：U.S. lender PNC said on Friday it will be opening more than 300 new branches by 2030, adding about 100 locations to its earlier plan as it looks to expand its in-person banking footprint.】
